title: Why do you think this place is boring?
body:
Let's face it.

This place is about as interesting as a 12-hour flight. At night. Over the ocean. Beside a fat person. In the middle of two seats. In the middle row of the plane. With an old woman talking about her cat at home sitting to your left. And she also has bladder problems.

Fun.

To me, this place is boring because lurkers don't post. Circlejerks don't jerk right. Everything not League is hated. Violent sh*tposting is absent. And everyone hates everything.

Great place to be.
